Title: Bandits
Actors: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Cate Blanchett, Troy Garity
Plot: Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 4 wins & 5 nominations.
Production: Cheyenne Enterprises, Metro Goldwyn Mayer, Hyde Park Entertainment, Empire Pictures, Lotus Pictures
